title: Mithril axe

Item ID1355

A mithril axe is an axe stronger than the black axe, and weaker than the adamant axe. Like all mithril weapons, it requires level 20 Attack to wield. It can be used in combat or in Woodcutting to cut trees. To cut a tree with this axe, a player must have 21 Woodcutting.

The success rate for chopping a log is approximately 250% that of the Bronze axe, or 11% better than a Black axe.

A player with 51 Smithing can make it using 1 mithril bar on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 50 Smithing experience.

A mithril axe is required in the Animal Magnetism quest, in which it is combined with a holy symbol and becomes a blessed axe.

The axe can be bought from Perry's Chop-chop Shop for 1,664 coins.

[[File:Mithril axe detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''mithril axe''' is an [[axe]] stronger than the [[black axe]], and weaker than the [[adamant axe]]. Like all mithril weapons, it requires level 20 [[Attack]] to wield. It can be used in combat or in [[Woodcutting]] to cut [[tree]]s. To cut a tree with this axe, a player must have 21 Woodcutting.

The success rate for chopping a log is approximately 250% that of the [[Bronze axe]], or 11% better than a [[Black axe]].

A player with 51 [[Smithing]] can make it using 1 [[mithril bar]] on an [[anvil]] while carrying a [[hammer]], granting 50 Smithing [[experience]].

A mithril axe is required in the [[Animal Magnetism]] quest, in which it is combined with a [[holy symbol]] and becomes a [[blessed axe]].

The axe can be bought from [[Perry's Chop-chop Shop]] for 1,664 [[coins]].
